text: Olwa omukhana wenyu yatsia naboola mbu: â€œ koo abechesiekhwo Omundu unyala okhumulela? Mana nikhukhukalusia khu mama wuwo kho tsimoni tsisie tsisangale ne kho alabeelela tawe. Ne wera Omundu mana khwakhuhabina okhurula mushibeela, mana nikhukhutema amatemo amanji, ne niwikhala emika eminji halala nende Abandu ba Madyan mana khandi witsile shingala walachilwa ewe Musa
